name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Life Staff
description: A staff infused with healing energy, capable of restoring health.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate engravings of nature and life. At the top of the staff, there is a glowing crystal that emits a soft green light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura around the wielder, restoring HP to nearby allies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A wickedly sharp dagger that renders its wielder invisible in the darkness.
looks: The dagger has a sleek black blade and a hilt made of obsidian. The edges of the blade seem to blend into the shadows, making it difficult to see.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak wood and adorned with intricate carvings that represent the different elements. Each element has a different gemstone embedded into the staff, adding to its mystical appearance.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells and abilities.

special_effects.unleash_elemental_power: Grants the ability to unleash a devastating elemental attack.

name: Flame Sword
description: A sword infused with the power of fire.
looks: The sword has a fiery blade with a hilt wrapped in black dragon leather.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing magic, capable of restoring health and vitality.
looks: The staff is made of smooth, polished wood with a silver cap on top. It emits a soft, gentle glow.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that restores health to nearby allies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Wand of Frost
description: A magical wand that harnesses the power of ice.
looks: The wand is made of shimmering ice and emits a cold mist. It is adorned with intricate frost patterns.

special_effects.freeze: Has a chance to freeze the target, immobilizing them for a short time.
